website_summaries.verdict: Bright projector provides a full HD ratio video signal. Software generates great color results.
pros: Includes 3,200 lumens rating for outstanding brightness levels
Maximum projection size of 277 inches for gaming or movies
Good audio quality with a 10-watt speaker
You'll receive deep blacks with this projector, thanks to its 22,000-to-1 contrast ratio
Sharp-looking projector with an all-black finish
cons: Minimum throw ratio of 1.49, which doesn't work well in really small rooms

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector, the colors are vibrant and picture very sharp. I had a few problems with my order but Amazon went above and beyond to resolve it. I paired it with an Elite screen as I wanted an indoor/outdoor setup. Sound quality is decent but I recommend hooking up external speakers for best experience. Price point is great for 1080p, get this, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: TheIronMaiden

customer_reviews.title: Definite upgrade from the previous model, which I also own. The 22,000:1 contrast ratio and extra lumen come in handy.
customer_reviews.text: Definite upgrade from the previous model, which I also own. The 22,000:1 contrast ratio and extra lumen come in handy. Works like a champ and is super bright. Love both of them. I bring one with me for work as I'm a resolution snob and presenting on a client's VGA or bad resolution projectors makes our product not appear as nice as it is or could be. Colors are better defined and truer. Get this, the carrrying case, 25 ft HDMI cable and extension cord/multi outlet and walk into any meeting present "Like A Boss!"

customer_reviews.title: Great budget projector, exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This projector is absolutely fantastic. I have had it for about 6 months and cannot speak highly enough about how well it has worked. The 3D functionality works great with the generic glasses i found on Amazon and the remote is great since my projector is mmounted to the roof of a book case. My picture size is around 6ft by 10ft and is the closest thing to a theatre i can get. A great purchase for those not wanting to go full 4k, which i think it not worth the difference since that tech is just in its infancy.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality projector for the price. We are currently shooting the image onto a textured wall until I have time to sand the surface down and use some metallic paint and it still looks 1080p quality even in the daytime with the lights on. I love the picture quality and the price. Now the cons... the digital zoom doesn't save so if you mount it somewhere that requires use of the digital zoom you'll have to do that every time you power it back on. Not too bad, but annoying none the less. It also beeps on power up and power down. Another annoyance that can't be changed in the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A thousand tiny red specks flickering on black screens...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second projector and overall I am not as satisfied as I was with my Epson 730HD. Everything is fine except for when the screen is dark / black and then there are thousands of tiny red specks flickering on the screen. I have tweaked the settings and now I am going to try and switch out the HDMI cable to see if that helps. I will also call ViewSonic and see if they can provide some guidance. If it were not for the red specks then I would be very satisfied with the value of this projector. I will keep you updated on the troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Adair

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price if you have a big room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for the price. The resolution, contrast, and brightness are excellent. This makes a great projector for a large room. However if you have a smaller room (under 12ft) move along and buy a short throw projector. Pros: Price Picture Quality Active 3D Capability MHL Two HDMI ports Can be used in daylight rooms Cons: Noise (when not in eco mode) Heat Will need to purchase an HDMI cable separately NO ZOOM (Need a lot of space for a decent size screen)

customer_reviews.title: Cord issues...very important!
customer_reviews.text: This projector came with a cord that didn't fit it, we had to purchase an separate HDMI cord to get it to work. It was a big pain. You would expect that a projector designed to work with a computer would come with the correct cord to connect it to a computer, out of the box. It came with a VGA cable, but what looked like a VGA port was not designed to fit that cord. Simple, but very important. When we did get the cord, it did work great.

product_meta.title: ViewSonic PJD7720HD 3200 Lumens 1080p HDMI Home Theater Projector
product_meta.description: The ViewSonic® LightStream® PJD7720HD Full HD projector features 3,200 lumens, Full HD 1920x1080 native resolution, an intuitive, user-friendly design and a sleek black chassis. Exclusive SuperColor™ technology offers a wide color gamut for beautiful image production in nearly any environment, while SonicExpert™, ViewSonic's proprietary sound enhancement technology, powers a 10W speaker to deliver incredibly clear and audible sound. PortAll™ - a neatly designed and enclosed HDMI/MHL connection compartment, supports wireless HDMI dongles or MHL connectors, while a cable management hood eliminates unsightly cable clutter. With a smart design, the PJD7720HD is the ideal projector for high definition presentations.
feature_bullets: BIG SCREEN HOME THEATER: Immersive theater-like experience in Full HD (1920x1080p) on a screen up to 300-inches in 3200 lumens
CINEMATIC COLORS: Exclusive Super Color technology offers a wide color gamut for beautiful image production in nearly any environment
PREMIUM AUDIO: Two built-in 10W speakers deliver room-filling audio to compliment your home theater experience
LONG LAMP LIFE: Dynamic Eco-mode mode allows the lamp to shine bright for up to 10,000 hours
INDUSTRY-LEADING WARRANTY: 3-year limited parts and labor coverage, 1-year of lamp coverage, and access to our US-based customer service team
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: Supports most media players, PCs, Macs, and mobile devices with input options such as HDMI, Mini USB, and more
INCLUDED IN THE BOX: PJD7720HD 1080p projector, power cable, and remote control
